metadata.name: Beijing
metadata.description:
This artwork started out as a line drawing of the Central Business District in Beijing.

I was especially interested in the angles and layout of the area and the dynamic appearance of the CCTV headquarters and the drawing quickly took on a semi-abstract quality.

I decided to colour this artwork and to include a vignette of the Hall of Mental Cultivation - a building in the Forbidden City - as a reference to the historical area of Beijing.

This artwork prints at 50cm x 70cm and purchase of this NFT on primary comes with a signed giclee print of the artwork which is shipped worldwide (according to current shipping rules and regulations).

This is the first in a series of artworks that aim to represent different aspects of well known cities within a single image.
